conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and pass through baffles to reach containers E, F, or G.

The gray baffle is slanted and positioned to deflect liquid to the right side of the container.

conclusion: Stream A is deflected to the left side of the container.

conclusion: Stream B is deflected to the left side of the container.
